name: Ichneumon
movement: fast movement with a walking speed of 50 feet
description: The Ichneumon is a Large creature with impressive physical attributes, displaying exceptional strength and dexterity, showcasing powerful melee attacks.
memorable: It can evade damage with its Evasion ability and is particularly dangerous against dragons due to its Draconic Predator ability.
goals: To hunt down prey and engage in combat with formidable foes.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other monstrous creatures and potentially rivals to dragons.
environment: Typically found in varied environments suitable for monstrous life, particularly those with predators.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity scores provide it with powerful attacks and good evasiveness, along with multiple damage resistances.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence may hinder its problem-solving abilities and strategic planning.
attacks: Uses powerful bite and claw attacks; can grapple targets with its bite, restraining them.
most_powerful_ability: Draconic Predator grants immunity to dragons' frightful presence and advantage on saving throws against breath weapons.
senses: Has Keen Hearing and Smell, granting an advantage on Perception checks reliant on these senses.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, and Survival, showcasing strong physical competence.
additional_information: Mud Armor ability increases AC when mud is applied.
Resists damage from multiple types including acid, cold, fire, lightning, and poison.
Excels in grappling enemies, severely limiting their ability to act.
High mobility with the ability to move swiftly in combat.
Surprisingly agile despite its large size.
test_queries: large formidable monster with keen senses
monster that attacks with powerful bites and claws
agile creature that grapples its prey
resilient creature with multiple damage resistances
fast-moving predator with immunity to dragon powers
